Hildegard Goss-Mayr (Amụrụ na 22 Jenụwarị 1930, Vienna) bụ onye Austria na-eme ihe ike na-enweghị ihe ike na onye ọkà mmụta okpukpe Ndị Kraịst.
Nwa nwanyị nke Kaspar Mayr, onye guzobere alaka Austria nke International Fellowship of Reconciliation, ọ gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma na Vienna na New Haven
N'afọ 1958, ọ lụrụ Jean Goss (1912X1991), onye France na-ahụ maka udo; di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ abụọ, Myriam na Etienne.
Ya na di ya nọ na Rom n'oge Council Vatican nke Abụọ na-agba mbọ ka Chọọchị Roman Katọlik mara nkwenye nke akọ na uche
N'afọ 1960s/70s, ha biri ma rụọ ọrụ ruo oge ụfọdụ na South America, na-azụ ndị otu na-eme ihe ike na-adịghị arụ ọrụ ma na-enyere aka n'ịmepụta SERPAJ, onye nhazi mbụ ya bụ Adolfo Pérez Esquivel
Ha zụrụ ìgwè ndị ọzọ na-adịghị eme ihe ike n'ọtụtụ mba, na Europe, Eshia, Middle East na Africa
Ha sonyere na nkwadebe nke People Power Revolution na Philippines n'afọ 1986.

Jean Goss na Hildegard Goss-Mayr kerịtara ọtụtụ Peace Prizes, gụnyere Bruno Kreisky Award na Austria n'afọ 1979, Pax Christi USA Pope Paul VI Teacher of Peace Award n'afọ 1986, na Pfeffer Peace Prize n'afọ 1990.
N'afọ 1991, Goss-Mayr enwetakwala ihe nrite Niwano Peace Prize, na Japan, na, n'afọ 2009, Pacem in Terris Peace and Freedom Award, site na Diocese nke Davenport, Iowa
Ọ bụ ugbu a onye isi oche nsọpụrụ nke International Fellowship of Reconciliation.
A họpụtara ya maka Nobel Peace Prize n'afọ 1979, na 1987 ruo afọ 2005 n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị 1000 maka Nobel Peace Prix 2005 site na PeaceWomen Across the Globe.
